verses.verse: מֹאזְנֵ֣י <WH3976> balance מִ֭רְמָה <WH4820> A false תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <WH8441> [is] abomination יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> to the LORD וְאֶ֖בֶן <WH68> weight שְׁלֵמָ֣ה <WH8003> but a just רְצוֹנֽוֹ׃ <WH7522> [is] his delight
בָּֽא־ <WH935> cometh זָ֭דוֹן <WH2087> [When] pride וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> then cometh קָל֑וֹן <WH7036> shame וְֽאֶת־ <WH854> with צְנוּעִ֥ים <WH6800> but with the lowly חָכְמָֽה׃ <WH2451> [is] wisdom

תֻּמַּ֣ת <WH8538> The integrity יְשָׁרִ֣ים <WH3477> of the upright תַּנְחֵ֑ם <WH5148> shall guide וְסֶ֖לֶף <WH5558> them but the perverseness בּוֹגְדִ֣ים <WH898> of transgressors [וְשַׁדָּם כ] (יְשָׁדֵּֽם׃ <WH7703> dead ק)

לֹא־ <WH3808> not יוֹעִ֣יל <WH3276> profit ה֭וֹן <WH1952> Riches בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> not in the day עֶבְרָ֑ה <WH5678> of wrath וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה <WH6666> but righteousness תַּצִּ֥יל <WH5337> delivereth מִמָּֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> from death

צִדְקַ֣ת <WH6666> The righteousness תָּ֭מִים <WH8549> of the perfect תְּיַשֵּׁ֣ר <WH3474> shall direct דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> his way וּ֝בְרִשְׁעָת֗וֹ <WH7564> by his own wickedness יִפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> shall fall רָשָֽׁע׃ <WH7563> but the wicked

צִדְקַ֣ת <WH6666> The righteousness יְ֭שָׁרִים <WH3477> of the upright תַּצִּילֵ֑ם <WH5337> shall deliver וּ֝בְהַוַּ֗ת <WH1942> in [their own] naughtiness בֹּגְדִ֥ים <WH898> them but transgressors יִלָּכֵֽדוּ׃ <WH3920> shall be taken

בְּמ֤וֹת <WH4194> dieth אָדָ֣ם <WH120> man רָ֭שָׁע <WH7563> When a wicked תֹּאבַ֣ד <WH6> shall perish תִּקְוָ֑ה <WH8615> [his] expectation וְתוֹחֶ֖לֶת <WH8431> and the hope אוֹנִ֣ים <WH205> of unjust אָבָֽדָה׃ <WH6> [men] perisheth
צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> The righteous מִצָּרָ֣ה <WH6869> of trouble נֶחֱלָ֑ץ <WH2502> is delivered out וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> cometh רָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> and the wicked תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place

בְּפֶ֗ה <WH6310> with [his] mouth חָ֭נֵף <WH2611> An hypocrite יַשְׁחִ֣ת <WH7843> destroyeth רֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> his neighbour וּ֝בְדַ֗עַת <WH1847> but through knowledge צַדִּיקִ֥ים <WH6662> shall the just יֵחָלֵֽצוּ׃ <WH2502> be delivered

בְּט֣וּב <WH2898> When it goeth well צַ֭דִּיקִים <WH6662> with the righteous תַּעֲלֹ֣ץ <WH5970> rejoiceth קִרְיָ֑ה <WH7151> the city וּבַאֲבֹ֖ד <WH6> perish רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> and when the wicked רִנָּֽה׃ <WH7440> [there is] shouting

בְּבִרְכַּ֣ת <WH1293> By the blessing יְ֭שָׁרִים <WH3477> of the upright תָּר֣וּם <WH7311> is exalted קָ֑רֶת <WH7176> the city וּבְפִ֥י <WH6310> by the mouth רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> of the wicked תֵּהָרֵֽס׃ <WH2040> but it is overthrown

בָּז־ <WH936> despiseth לְרֵעֵ֥הוּ <WH7453> his neighbour חֲסַר־ <WH2638> He that is void לֵ֑ב <WH3820> of wisdom וְאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> but a man תְּבוּנ֣וֹת <WH8394> of understanding יַחֲרִֽישׁ׃ <WH2790> holdeth his peace

הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> goes רָ֭כִיל <WH7400> A talebearer מְגַלֶּה־ <WH1540> revealeth סּ֑וֹד <WH5475> secrets וְנֶאֱמַן־ <WH539> but he that is of a faithful ר֝֗וּחַ <WH7307> spirit מְכַסֶּ֥ה <WH3680> concealeth דָבָֽר׃ <WH1697> the matter

בְּאֵ֣ין <WH369> there תַּ֭חְבֻּלוֹת <WH8458> Where no counsel יִפָּל־ <WH5307> fall עָ֑ם <WH5971> [is] the people וּ֝תְשׁוּעָ֗ה <WH8668> [there is] safety בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> but in the multitude יוֹעֵֽץ׃ <WH3289> of counsellors

רַע־ <WH7451> will surely יֵ֭רוֹעַ <WH7489> suffer כִּי־ <WH3588> for עָ֣רַב <WH6148> He that is surety זָ֑ר <WH2114> for a stranger וְשֹׂנֵ֖א <WH8130> [for it] and he that hateth תֹקְעִ֣ים <WH8628> suretiship בּוֹטֵֽחַ׃ <WH982> is sure
אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> woman חֵ֭ן <WH2580> A gracious תִּתְמֹ֣ךְ <WH8551> retaineth כָּב֑וֹד <WH3519> honour וְ֝עָרִיצִ֗ים <WH6184> and strong יִתְמְכוּ־ <WH8551> [men] retain עֹֽשֶׁר׃ <WH6239> riches

גֹּמֵ֣ל <WH1580> doeth good נַ֭פְשׁוֹ <WH5315> to his own soul אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man חָ֑סֶד <WH2617> The merciful וְעֹכֵ֥ר <WH5916> troubleth שְׁ֝אֵר֗וֹ <WH7607> his own flesh אַכְזָרִֽי׃ <WH394> but [he that is] cruel

רָשָׁ֗ע <WH7563> The wicked עֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> worketh פְעֻלַּת־ <WH6468> work שָׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> a deceitful וְזֹרֵ֥עַ <WH2232> but to him that soweth צְ֝דָקָ֗ה <WH6666> righteousness שֶׂ֣כֶר <WH7938> reward אֱמֶֽת׃ <WH571> [shall be] a sure

כֵּן־ <WH3651> in צְדָקָ֥ה <WH6666> As righteousness לְחַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> [tendeth] to life וּמְרַדֵּ֖ף <WH7291> so he that pursueth רָעָ֣ה <WH7451> evil לְמוֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH4194> [pursueth it] to his own death

תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <WH8441> [are] abomination יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> to the LORD עִקְּשֵׁי־ <WH6141> They that are of a froward לֵ֑ב <WH3820> heart וּ֝רְצוֹנ֗וֹ <WH7522> [are] his delight תְּמִ֣ימֵי <WH8549> but [such as are] upright דָֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> in [their] way

יָ֣ד <WH3027> [Though] hand לְ֭יָד <WH3027> [join] in hand לֹא־ <WH3808> will not יִנָּ֣קֶה <WH5352> shall not be unpunished רָּ֑ע <WH7451> the wicked וְזֶ֖רַע <WH2233> but the seed צַדִּיקִ֣ים <WH6662> of the righteous נִמְלָֽט׃ <WH4422> shall be delivered

נֶ֣זֶם <WH5141> [As] a jewel זָ֭הָב <WH2091> of gold בְּאַ֣ף <WH639> snout חֲזִ֑יר <WH2386> in a swine's אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> woman יָ֝פָ֗ה <WH3303> [so is] a fair וְסָ֣רַת <WH5493> which is without טָֽעַם׃ <WH2940> discretion

תַּאֲוַ֣ת <WH8378> The desire צַדִּיקִ֣ים <WH6662> of the righteous אַךְ־ <WH389> is only ט֑וֹב <WH2896> [is] only good תִּקְוַ֖ת <WH8615> [but] the expectation רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked עֶבְרָֽה׃ <WH5678> [is] wrath

יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> There is מְ֭פַזֵּר <WH6340> that scattereth וְנוֹסָ֥ף <WH3254> and yet increaseth ע֑וֹד <WH5750> all וְחוֹשֵׂ֥ךְ <WH2820> and [there is] that withholdeth מִ֝יֹּ֗שֶׁר <WH3476> more than is meet אַךְ־ <WH389> only לְמַחְסֽוֹר׃ <WH4270> but [it tendeth] to poverty

נֶֽפֶשׁ־ <WH5315> soul בְּרָכָ֥ה <WH1293> The liberal תְדֻשָּׁ֑ן <WH1878> shall be made fat וּ֝מַרְוֶ֗ה <WH7301> and he that watereth גַּם־ <WH1571> again ה֥וּא <WH1931> will himself יוֹרֶֽא׃ <WH3384> shall be watered

מֹ֣נֵֽעַ <WH4513> He that withholdeth בָּ֭ר <WH1250> corn יִקְּבֻ֣הוּ <WH5344> shall curse לְא֑וֹם <WH3816> the people וּ֝בְרָכָ֗ה <WH1293> him but blessing לְרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> [shall be] upon the head מַשְׁבִּֽיר׃ <WH7666> of him that selleth

שֹׁ֣חֵֽר <WH7836> He that diligently seeketh ט֭וֹב <WH2896> good יְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <WH1245> procureth רָצ֑וֹן <WH7522> favour וְדֹרֵ֖שׁ <WH1875> but he that seeketh רָעָ֣ה <WH7451> mischief תְבוֹאֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH935> it shall come

בּוֹטֵ֣חַ <WH982> He that trusteth בְּ֭עָשְׁרוֹ <WH6239> in his riches ה֣וּא <WH1931> he יִפֹּ֑ל <WH5307> shall fall וְ֝כֶעָלֶ֗ה <WH5929> as a branch צַדִּיקִ֥ים <WH6662> but the righteous יִפְרָֽחוּ׃ <WH6524> shall flourish

עוֹכֵ֣ר <WH5916> He that troubleth בֵּ֭יתוֹ <WH1004> his own house יִנְחַל־ <WH5157> shall inherit ר֑וּחַ <WH7307> the wind וְעֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> [shall be] servant אֱ֝וִ֗יל <WH191> and the fool לַחֲכַם־ <WH2450> to the wise לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> of heart

פְּֽרִי־ <WH6529> The fruit צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> of the righteous עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> [is] a tree חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> of life וְלֹקֵ֖חַ <WH3947> and he that winneth נְפָשׂ֣וֹת <WH5315> souls חָכָֽם׃ <WH2450> [is] wise

הֵ֣ן <WH2005> If צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> Behold the righteous בָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the earth יְשֻׁלָּ֑ם <WH7999> shall be recompensed אַ֝֗ף <WH637> How כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for רָשָׁ֥ע <WH7563> much more the wicked וְחוֹטֵֽא׃ <WH2398> and the sinner
